Package com.azure.spring.messaging.implementation.config

Interface AzureListenerEndpoint

All Known Subinterfaces:
MethodAzureListenerEndpoint
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAzureListenerEndpoint, MethodEventHubsListenerEndpoint, MethodServiceBusListenerEndpoint
public interface AzureListenerEndpoint
Model for a Azure listener endpoint. Can be used against a AzureListenerConfigurer to register endpoints programmatically.

  • Method Summary

      Get the group for the corresponding listener container.

      the group for the corresponding listener container.

    • setupListenerContainer

      void setupListenerContainer(MessageListenerContainer listenerContainer, AzureMessageConverter<?,?> messageConverter)
      Set up the specified message listener container with the model defined by this endpoint.

      This endpoint must provide the requested missing option(s) of the specified container to make it usable. Usually, this is about setting the destination and the messageListener to use but an implementation may override any default setting that was already set.

      Parameters:
      listenerContainer - the listener container to configure
      messageConverter - the message converter to configure
